API¶

coupled_modelling.load_onto(path=None)[source]¶

Loads an ontology.

Parameters:

path (str, optional) – Path to the ontology file, defaults to None

Returns:

An ontology loaded from the specified file

Return type:

owlready2.namespace.Ontology

coupled_modelling.sync_entity(entity)[source]¶

For a given entity, queries exisiting analogues from Wikidata and DBpedia by its label and writes it to the entity’s annotation.

Parameters:

entity – An entity from your ontology.

coupled_modelling.create_variable(onto, name, data, sync=True)[source]¶

Creates in an ontology a DataProperty and a class for a variable.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • name (str) – Name of the variable.

  • data (dict) – Annotations of the variable.

  • sync (bool) – If to synchronize a created entity with existing

  • bases. (knowledge) –

Returns:

A created class for the variable

Return type:

onto.Variable

coupled_modelling.create_variables(onto, variables, sync=True)[source]¶

Creates in an ontology DataProperties and classes for a list of variables.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • variables (dict) – A dictionary of variable names with their annotations.

  • sync (bool) – If to synchronize created entities with existing

  • bases. (knowledge) –

Returns:

A list of created classes for the variables

Return type:

list

  • bases. (knowledge) –

coupled_modelling.sync_coupled(model, coupled)[source]¶

Synchronizes inputs and outputs of a model with a coupled system.

Parameters:

  • model (onto.Model) – The model.

  • coupled (onto.CoupledSystem) – The coupled system to synchronize.

coupled_modelling.create_model(onto, name, data, coupled, sync=True)[source]¶

Creates in an ontology a class for a model.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • name (str) – Name of the model.

  • data (dict) – Annotations of the model.

  • coupled (onto.CoupledSystem or str) – A coupled system to which the

  • str (model belongs. If) –

  • system. (creates a new class for the coupled) –

  • sync (bool) – If to synchronize a created entity with existing

  • bases. (knowledge) –

Returns:

A created class for the model.

Return type:

onto.Model

coupled_modelling.create_models(onto, models, coupled, sync=True)[source]¶

Creates in an ontology classes for a list of models.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • models (dict) – A dictionary of model names with their annotations.

  • coupled (onto.CoupledSystem or str) – A coupled system to which the

  • str (models belongs. If) –

  • system. (creates a new class for the coupled) –

  • sync (bool) – If to synchronize created entities with existing

  • bases. (knowledge) –

Returns:

The coupled system to which the models belongs.

Return type:

onto.CoupledSystem

coupled_modelling.create_value(onto, variable, value, coupled_inst)[source]¶

Creates in an ontology an instance of a variable with its value.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • variable (str) – Name of the variable class to instanciate.

  • value (float) – The variable value to specify.

  • coupled_inst (onto.CoupledSystem) – An instance of a coupled system.

coupled_modelling.create_values(onto, values, coupled_inst)[source]¶

Creates in an ontology instances of a list of variables with their values.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • values (dict) – A dictionary of variable names with their values.

  • coupled_inst (onto.CoupledSystem) – An instance of a coupled system.

coupled_modelling.sync_inputs(onto, model_inst, coupled_inst)[source]¶

Synchronizes inputs of a coupled system instance with an instance of a model.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • model_inst (onto.Model) – An instance of a model.

  • coupled_inst (onto.CoupledSystem) – An instance of a coupled system

  • with. (to synchronize) –

coupled_modelling.sync_outputs(coupled_inst, output_var_inst)[source]¶

Synchronizes outputs of a coupled system instance with an instance of a model output variable.

Parameters:

  • coupled_inst (onto.CoupledSystem) – The instance of a coupled system.

  • output_var_inst (onto.Variable) – The instance of the model output

  • variable. –

coupled_modelling.run_model(onto, model_inst, foo)[source]¶

Executed a given function, taken a model inputs as arguments.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • model_inst (onto.Model) – An instance of a model.

  • foo (func) – The function to execute.

Returns:

A result of the function execution.

coupled_modelling.create_model_run(onto, model, coupled_inst, foo)[source]¶

Creates a model run and executes a given function.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • model (onto.Model) – A class of the model to run.

  • coupled_inst (onto.CoupledSystem) – An instance of a coupled system.

  • foo (func) – The function to execute.

coupled_modelling.save_onto(onto, path)[source]¶

Saves the ontology into a file.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • path (str) – Path to the file to save.

coupled_modelling.export_model_for_kratos(model)[source]¶

Exports a model in a KRATOS format.

Parameters:

model (onto.Model) – The model to export.

Returns:

A dictionary with the model data in the KRATOS format.

Return type:

dict

coupled_modelling.export_coupled_for_kratos(onto, coupled)[source]¶

Exports models from a coupled system in the KRATOS format.

Parameters:

  • onto (owlready2.namespace.Ontology) – Ontology.

  • coupled (onto.CoupledSystem) – The class for coupled system to export.

Returns:

A list of models data from the coupled system in KRATOS format.

Return type:

list
